title: The Reincarnated Person Doesn’t Want to Cheat (WN) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Female Protagonist   Magic   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't
author: Natsuki Aoi
description:
「....... Parallel world reincarnation exists.」

「Is your head all right ?」

Because of the stray ball from her childhood friend, Mira remembered a part of her previous life’s memories.

She was dragged to the National Magic Academy examination that comes today and sure enough her magic cheats were recognized.

It's to support her poor family but she refuses to do such troublesome things!>
